entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Williams Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Williams Lake Airport 12:15 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: ESE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain becoming mixed with periods of snow near midnight and ending overnight then cloudy. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
